Standards.description: The Phenopacket Schema is an ISO-endorsed open standard for sharing disease and phenotype information.
Standards.name: Phenopackets

Standards.description: SSSOM is a simple metadata standard for describing semantic mappings.
Standards.name: SSSOM

Ontologies.description: The HPO provides a standardized vocabulary of phenotypic abnormalities in human disease.
Ontologies.name: HPO

Ontologies.description: The Mondo Disease Ontology aims to harmonizes disease definitions across the world.
Ontologies.name: Mondo

Ontologies.description: uPheno aims to unify the annotation of phenotypes across species.
Ontologies.name: uPheno

Tools.description: The Exomiser is a tool for finding potential disease-causing variants in whole-exome or whole-genome sequencing data.
Tools.name: Exomiser

Tools.description: The Monarch App is a web application for exploring the Monarch Knowledge Graph.
Tools.name: Monarch App

Tools.description: LIkelihood Ratio Interpretation of Clinical AbnormaLities performs phenotype-driven prioritization of candidate diseases and genes in the setting of genomic diagnostics.
Tools.name: LIRICAL

Tools.description: OntoGPT is a Python package for extracting structured information from text with large language models (LLMs), instruction prompts, and ontology-based grounding.
Tools.name: OntoGPT

Tools.description: SSSOM Mappings collected and curated by the Monarch Initiative.
Tools.name: Monarch Mapping Commons
